item.title: Flyposted advertising board, 25th September
item.description:
A paving company has flyposted yet another large unsightly advertising board. It is on the Give Way post on the corner of Castlecombe Road and Beaconsfield Road. This company are always doing this, perhaps you need to contact them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castlecombe Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: Bricks flytipped in Elmstead Woods, 25th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaconsfield Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: Four blocked drains, 25th September
item.description:
There are 4 blocked drains walking down chapel street to Grosvenor place - at the bottom end of chapel street. Drain 1 just before the intersection with Headfort Place Drain 2 and 3 on the left hand side of the pavement leading down to Grosvenor Place Drain 4 inset into the pavement is blocked. I have reported all of these drains at least twice in the last 6 months. If these arenâ€™t unblock I will need to escalate

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-24, Chapel Street, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Heating, 25th September
item.description:

item.title: The rubbish and grass debris, 25th September

item.title: Grass growing on pavements and pavement verges, 25th September
item.description:
Sidcup is now looking very neglected by the Council with regard to Grass verges and weeds growing up from the road up to the pavements as well as weeds on pavements. As seen in Rectory Lane, but am sure that same has happened in the whole of Sidcup.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Too many to count, 25th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arch 24, Cornwall Road, Waterloo, London
